Date: 2026-02-03
Description: The online teaching job market has become highly competitive with fewer positions available. Employers prioritize diversity, equity, and inclusion. Flexibility is decreasing due to the rise of hybrid courses. A strong CV is essential. Applicants must be persistent in their job search. We can help you with this.

## Page 18: 
      Custom Job Search
 – Faculty Job Tools
URL: https://facultyjobtools.com/products/custom-job-search
Description: Looking for a higher education or faculty job in a specific region? Faculty Job Tools Custom Job Search for Higher Ed Faculty and Administrators helps you find targeted academic job leads or contacts at colleges and universities in your preferred area. Get 12–16 curated leads each month—whether you're seeking teaching roles, administrative positions, or academic leadership jobs. Combine with our faculty job application services to boost your visibility and success rate. Ideal for job seekers in academia who want focused, region-specific results.
